name: Romance of Three Kingdoms Background Environment - VN Scenes
description: Generate Visual Novel backgrounds in Romance of Three Kingdoms painted style. Includes palace halls, war camps, battlefields, mountain passes, city gates, and other period-appropriate environments.

style_reference.primary_inspiration: Romance of Three Kingdoms game backgrounds, Dynasty Warriors environments, traditional Chinese landscape painting

visual_characteristics.style: Ink-wash and semi-realistic hybrid, painterly matte background
visual_characteristics.atmosphere: Mild filmic haze, atmospheric perspective with depth layers
visual_characteristics.lighting: Warm cinematic lighting, strategic cool accents for depth

include_distant_figures.description: Add blurred background figures for life/atmosphere

parallax_ready.description: Compose with clear depth layers for parallax scrolling

style_prompt_block: Romance of Three Kingdoms game art, KOEI Tecmo quality, environment background scene, semi-realistic painted illustration, ink wash painting influence, atmospheric perspective, Han dynasty Chinese aesthetic, warm cinematic lighting, professional game background art, AAA environment design, 8k, masterpiece, best quality
negative_prompt_block: main character dominating composition, portrait focus, modern elements, contemporary architecture, anime cel shading, oversharp outlines, logo text, watermark stamps, signature, blurry, low quality, amateur, western architecture, ugly, nsfw, text overlays, game UI elements

prompt_templates.composition_base: environment background scene, no main characters dominating composition, painterly matte background style, mild filmic haze, subtle vignette, parallax-ready depth composition with distinct foreground midground background layers

workflow_notes: This workflow generates VN backgrounds optimized for visual novel presentation. The 'no main characters dominating' constraint ensures backgrounds remain suitable for character sprite overlay. For parallax effects, generate at higher resolution and create depth map separately.
